name: Hitman in Dungeon
description:
In this game you played as a Hitman accidently enter the Dungeon world, you have to fight all the enemies in order to escape. Shoot some slimes, earn golds, buy better weapon and repeat!

Features:
· Pixel-art style
· Fully animated sprites
· Smooth difficulty curve
· 3 Type of weapons
· 4 Different levels

Contact:Email: alessio_gaming@protonmail.com

(Trailer music: Freesound - "Short Experimental Trailer - Koto, Strings and Effects.wav" by GregorQuendel)
